description: Delete a maintenance requirement set maintenance requirement.
permissions: Access is delegated to the related maintenance requirement set; the user must be authorized to delete or manage that set per MaintenanceRequirementSet policy.
side_effects: Deleting the link may delete the associated maintenance requirement when it is non-template, has no remaining set links, and has no mechanic user associations.
validation_notes: The record ID argument is required; --confirm must be provided to delete.
